languages.text: {n}Друкари насмешливо склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Что такое, {name}? Испугал{mf|ся|ась} того, что я начал раскрывать в тебе? Слабое сердце мон-кай не вынесло моей истины?"
{n}The Drukhari looks at you, a mocking tilt to his head.{/n} "What is wrong, {name}? Are you scared of what I have begun to uncover within you? Can your weak mon-keigh heart not endure my truth?"
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари насмешливо склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Что такое, {name}? Испугал{mf|ся|ась} того, что я начал раскрывать в тебе? Слабое сердце мон-кай не вынесло моей истины?"

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}El Drukhari te mira con un ladeo burlón de la cabeza.{/n} «¿Qué pasa, {name}? ¿Te da miedo lo que he empezado a descubrir en tu interior? ¿Es que tu débil corazón de mon-keigh es incapaz de soportar la verdad?».
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari looks at you, a mocking tilt to his head.{/n} "What is wrong, {name}? Are you scared of what I have begun to uncover within you? Can your weak mon-keigh heart not endure my truth?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El Drukhari te mira con un ladeo burlón de la cabeza.{/n} «¿Qué pasa, {name}? ¿Te da miedo lo que he empezado a descubrir en tu interior? ¿Es que tu débil corazón de mon-keigh es incapaz de soportar la verdad?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋看着你，嘲弄地歪着头。{/n}“怎么了，{name}？你害怕我揭开你的本质吗？莫非猴子脆弱的心灵，无法承受我带来的真相吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari looks at you, a mocking tilt to his head.{/n} "What is wrong, {name}? Are you scared of what I have begun to uncover within you? Can your weak mon-keigh heart not endure my truth?"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋看着你，嘲弄地歪着头。{/n}“怎么了，{name}？你害怕我揭开你的本质吗？莫非猴子脆弱的心灵，无法承受我带来的真相吗？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}デュカーリはあなたを見て、嘲るように首をかしげる。{/n}「どうした、{name}？秘密を暴かれるのが怖いのか？お前の弱々しいモン＝ケイの心は、真実に耐えられないってか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari looks at you, a mocking tilt to his head.{/n} "What is wrong, {name}? Are you scared of what I have begun to uncover within you? Can your weak mon-keigh heart not endure my truth?"

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリはあなたを見て、嘲るように首をかしげる。{/n}「どうした、{name}？秘密を暴かれるのが怖いのか？お前の弱々しいモン＝ケイの心は、真実に耐えられないってか？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le Drukhari vous regarde en penchant la tête d'un air moqueur.{/n} « Où est le problème, {name} ? Vous avez peur de ce que j'ai commencé à exhumer en vous ? Votre petit cœur fragile de mon-keigh est-il trop faible pour résister à ma vérité toute nue ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari looks at you, a mocking tilt to his head.{/n} "What is wrong, {name}? Are you scared of what I have begun to uncover within you? Can your weak mon-keigh heart not endure my truth?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Drukhari vous regarde en penchant la tête d'un air moqueur.{/n} « Où est le problème, {name} ? Vous avez peur de ce que j'ai commencé à exhumer en vous ? Votre petit cœur fragile de mon-keigh est-il trop faible pour résister à ma vérité toute nue ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Drukhari blickt dich an, den Kopf leicht spöttisch geneigt.{/n} "Was ist denn, {name}? Habt Ihr etwa Angst, was ich in Euch aufzudecken begonnen habe? Kann Euer schwaches Chem-Pan-Sey-Herz meine Wahrheit nicht ertragen?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari looks at you, a mocking tilt to his head.{/n} "What is wrong, {name}? Are you scared of what I have begun to uncover within you? Can your weak mon-keigh heart not endure my truth?"

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari looks at you, a mocking tilt to his head.{/n} "What is wrong, ? Are you scared of what I have begun to uncover within you? Can your weak mon-keigh heart not endure my truth?"

languages.text: {n}Drukhari, alaycı bir şekilde başını eğip sana bakıyor.{/n} "Ne oldu {name}? İçinde uyandırdıklarımdan mı korktun? O zayıf mon-keigh kalbin, hakikate dayanamadı mı yoksa?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari looks at you, a mocking tilt to his head.{/n} "What is wrong, {name}? Are you scared of what I have begun to uncover within you? Can your weak mon-keigh heart not endure my truth?"

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
